SELECT jt.idx, jt.title, jt.subtitle, jt.hit, jt.status, ut.nick, it.file_path FROM journal_table jt JOIN plan_table pt ON jt.plan_idx = pt.idx JOIN user_table ut ON pt.user_idx = ut.idx LEFT JOIN image_table it ON it.plan_idx = pt.idx WHERE jt.status = '0' ORDER BY jt.hit DESC, jt.reg_date DESC LIMIT 3
